title: [AoShen] Birdy the Mighty Decode 1-13 [h.264-720p]
description:
Birdy the Mighty Decode or Tetsuwan Birdy Decode (Japanese).

This is a batch for AoShen's h.264 releases. AoShen released an XviD batch more than a month ago, but nothing happened to this day so I took the liberty to release it before them. Here you go!

Details:
Length: ~24 min. each
Size: 200-290 MB each
Resolution: 1280 x 720
Format: MKV (Matroska) More info: http://www.matroska.org/

-------------

Genres: action, science fiction
Themes: gender switch

Plot Summary:
Federation investigator Birdy chases the space criminal Geega through space to Earth, where he hides in the entertainment industry under a human disguise. Birdy goes undercover herself, posing as famous model Arita Shion that often uses a space girl look. A male student, Senkawa, stumbles upon a fight between the two one night in an abandoned building only to be severed in half as he is used as a shield by Geega against Birdy. Birdy heals him from imminent death in some fashion- but Senkawas body, and life, are now changed and permanently linked to Birdy.*
                                                               *"borrowed" from ANN
More info can be found at...
http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=9287
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Birdy_the_Mighty_Decode
http://myanimelist.net/anime/3974/Tetsuwan_Birdy_Decode

And the XviD batch can be found at AoShen's website under "Complete". Just Google AoShen if you don't know their site.

PS. DON'T FORGET TO SEED FOR AT LEAST 24 HOURS AFTER FINISHED DOWNLOAD! NO HIT 'N' RUNS!!!

EDIT: Date: 14 December 2008 | Reason: Fixed some minor problems. Should be easier to read the text now.
